summary: THE 'START/STOP' BUTTON TO TURN OFF THE VEHICLE, CAN BE DONE IN ANY GEAR. WHEN DONE IN "PARK" THE VEHICLE LOCKS UP THE WHEELS AND THE VEHICLE DOES NOT ROLL. WHEN STOPPED IN OTHER GREARS' THE VEHICLE WILL ROLL OUT OF MY DRIVEWAY. VEHICLE SHOULD BE CORRECTED SO THE TRANSMISSION WILL LOCK THE WHEELS UP WHEN THE VEHICLE IS TURNED OFF IN ANY TRANSMISSION POSITION.
